title: Perfect for our subscription business
review: Chargebee simplified our entire billing workflow. The recurring billing automation and customer portal are fantastic. Our finance team loves the reporting capabilities.

title: Comprehensive billing solution
review: We migrated from a homegrown solution to Chargebee. The migration tools and support made the transition smooth. Now we have proper revenue recognition and can handle complex pricing scenarios easily.

title: Good but could be more intuitive
review: Chargebee has all the features we need but the interface can be confusing at times. Once you learn where everything is, it's powerful. The API is well-documented which helped our developers.

title: Handles enterprise complexity well
review: Our multi-entity, multi-currency setup works flawlessly with Chargebee. The tax handling and compliance features are a huge time saver. Worth the investment for complex billing needs.

title: Decent platform with some quirks
review: Overall satisfied with Chargebee. The webhook system is reliable and integrations with our stack work well. Some features feel over-engineered for simpler use cases though.
